title: Cannot login
body:
HI

Uhh just wanted to say i can't login into LoL for some reason, it's kinda pissing me off and if you think that "Try your smurf" well i already hav. My main and my smurf cannot login, SO i thought it was something with my LoLClient, i check the folders and everything, it's all in check. So now i think it's something wrong with the LoL servers.

Please help if you have any idea wtf is actually happening.
Thanks

MastersYiAndMe

replies.body:
Having this issue too atm...

edit: Seems persistence is the way to go, tried about four more times and got in...

Hey dude, i found a solution, i should've known this:

1) Restart cpu
2) Login
3) Open LoLClient
4) Login
5) (If you get to this stage) CELEBRATE BY WINNING

That's how i logged in anyway
